website_summaries.verdict: The Plantronics BackBeat Sense Bluetooth headphones pack very good performance and battery life in a remarkably light and comfortable on-ear package.
pros: Very good sound quality with powerful lows
cons: Balance emphasizes lows and highs at slight expense to high-mids
Canvas carrying pouch is a little awkward to use

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: These are best headphones I have owned, sound quaility is better than my previous beats. Grest features such as auto stop play when take of your head, long life battery, microphone (hear around you) when crossing the road etc
customer_reviews.author: James Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Sent item back as when I turned on items Bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent item back as when I turned on items Bluetooth to pair and followed instructions to wait for the 3 blue lights to flash and then red light it failed to pair with device, however I was told on return that the item was not faulty and had paired with there devices.. and they refused to pay for my £5 return costs. Wouldn’t buy from again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minus 1 star for missing packaging but the product is 5 star all the way
customer_reviews.text: The pair I bought for £70.73 was fulfilled by Headset Solutions Ltd and came without the packaging shown in the photos or a manual. I purchased these as a gift and was initially unhappy about the presentation but the product was so good the lack of packaging was quickly overlooked. I was so impressed with their design and technical capability that I have bought another pair for the office to replace my cabled Logitech USB headset.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M Lyth

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and a great battery life
customer_reviews.text: brought them a year ago after trying out and returning the Bose equivalents. Similar sound but the controls are much easier to use and more intuitive. Very comfortable and a great battery life. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Philip I Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed headphones but sadly blighted with a crackling sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed headphones but sadly blighted with a crackling sound that was not resolved by numerous software updates. Real shame.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M Stone

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color but nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: The product was brown in all of the pictures and those brown ones I wanted. Eventually I got a black product. Would have got them 10 pounds cheaper if I would have ordered the ones that were black in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Better sound than both my AKG and Jabra revo's. Much better in terms of connection stability, comfort and features. Only downside really is that the don't fold so although small and light, are not overly compact
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: 18 months and then broke
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth stopped working after 18 months. Also, they got really sweaty when trying to use them as gym headphones. Disappointing. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerz1

customer_reviews.title: Rarely am I 100% happy with a purchase
customer_reviews.text: Rarely am I 100% happy with a purchase, but these are great! The sound is acceptable for 'phones at this price. All features work as described, including Siri. Wind and movement do cause unwanted noise, but it does not annoy me much. Perfect for a daily rail commute.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly headphones. I tend to use them mainly for listening to audio books but with either books are music, these excel my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: stucody

customer_reviews.title: Great service from supplier and arrived earlier than amazon predicted
customer_reviews.text: Only had a short time but look brand new and work really well. Great service from supplier and arrived earlier than amazon predicted.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound, easy to use, very comfortable, beautiful design. We have been delighted with the wireless controls and battery life. There are some smart features such as when you take the headphones off the music automatically pauses. A smash hit in our hous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this headphone.
customer_reviews.text: Love this headphone, nice looking and solid build. My first Bluetooth headphone and starting to realize why Apple abandoned the headphones jack.
customer_reviews.author: Xu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headsets
customer_reviews.text: Super light and great sound. After a lot of tries finally an over/on the ear headset that doesn't cause pain after a couple of hours use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made headphones 🎧
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound,well made.nice colour very comfortable to wear ,lovely presentation box and pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah tonge

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight bins
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight with a good sound quality. Nice case too.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I ever had
customer_reviews.text: It's been a week since I purchased them. I was a bit concerned about the base, but it's not bad at all. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Antonis A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality built and sound very pleased. It arrived on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Mansi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and very comfortable to wear but the build ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and very comfortable to wear but the build quality is poor. I've had to return two pairs. The first pair the automatic pause stopped working after a week. You can live with that but they were brand new so it should work and it was a handy feature. The second pair were worse...the bluetooth kept on dropping out and the volume control stopped working within a few days so they became unusable. Its a shame as when they work they are very good and I have other Plantronic headphones that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Si McLuckie

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BUY FOR USE WITH IPHONE OR IPAD
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT TO USE THEM WITH A MACBOOK PRO. They're fine with an iPhone or iPad but don't make the mistake I made and buy them to use with a MacBook. To be fair, Plantronics don't advertise them as working with laptops and, trust me, they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for 2 years and they are excellent. They are lightweight and comfortable with good battery life, good APTx Low Latency Bluetooth connectivity and clear open sound. They're well travelled from Costa Rica to India and are used daily for listening to music and TV. They do not have a heavy thumping bass: if you like ott bass, these are not for you. But if you want comfortable headphones with good battery life and open, clear, distortion-free relaxing sound, look no further. The aptx LL works brilliantly with TV showing no lip sync problems. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. PT Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I am very deaf and these mean I can listen to my computer and telephones without being attached to them. I hated listening to music or programmes at a volume that I could hear knowing that the content wasn't compatible to my husband's taste or was disturbing him and I didn't enjoy being attached to my devices by headphones. Now I am free to move around while listening and my husband isn't disturbed - perfect harmony - thank you. And the sound quality is fantastic. Exactly as described, lightweight, comfortable, very good swift delivery, well packaged and easy to use. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ruffinoise

customer_reviews.title: Ok headphones, but overpriced for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: Style: love it or hate it. The do tend to be a little "office-ish", but they are so light you soon forget about it. The sound quality is not bad, but there is a lot of sound leaking (not ideal if you plan on using them on a bus or a train). Good feature of start-pause when you were the headphone, but I think they are too pricey for what they are. Ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Filippo

customer_reviews.title: Good software support.
customer_reviews.text: Software support and firmware updates are going to be a key differentiator of what devices will last the test of time and Plantronics has great support in this area, the easy headphone updater application makes this easy. You can also change additional settings on the headphones. You dont see this from many other wireless headphone manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Mooo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are absolutely fantastic. Light, comfortable and sound superb. Bluetooth connection is as expected from Plantronics, excellent range with no break up. Reviews from various sites are correct, 5 star. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Classy packaging added to the experience when they arrived. Easy to set up and excellent sound quality. They're not all about the bass, which suits me. Very few dropouts and decent battery life. Work well as hands free for taking calls too. Extremely lightweight and comfortable. I'm sure they'll show the dirt soon, but I bought white so that's to be expected. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: MattyMuso

customer_reviews.title: Best street headphones...
customer_reviews.text: Best on ear street headphones at this price point. SOOOO easy controls.
customer_reviews.author: Gezci

customer_reviews.title: DISAPOINTED BY THE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like at all .... not good for value so going to return it
customer_reviews.author: Mahi

customer_reviews.title: Initially great then useless. Time-consuming to return.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month or two then the audio started dropping out more and more. After 2.5 months they were pretty much unusable, then they died completely. And returning them is a fairly painful process.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. MacInnes

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset but the base is lacking and unbearable on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset but the base is lacking and unbearable on some tracks under some equaliser settings on Spotify.
customer_reviews.author: rugare

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Extremely light, very comfortable and great sound. Very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Want to love them....
customer_reviews.text: I really really want to like these headphones. My first pair arrived and were great but I quickly spotted that they weren't new and had already been used (naughty Amazon). I complained to Amazon and a new set arrived the next day. Since then I've had two more pairs and both of them have been faulty. The faults are with the headphones cutting out and unresponsive controls. Have just ordered my fourth pair so I have my fingers crossed as I'm a massive fan of the brand and have just got rid of my Bose for these. I also bought a pair of these for my misses and so far, she's had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: thinkmilo

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound and great features. Especially like the switch for enabling external ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality sound and great features. Especially like the switch for enabling external sound in the environment you're in - handy when you're at the checkout in the supermarket. Feel solidly made so quite durable and extremely comfortable and light. Would have liked a bit more volume, but the sound is of a high quality with rounded lows and crisp highs. Remember to switch to cable operation when not using them otherwise the sound on your smartphone will default to external output and you won't be able to hear anything from the phones speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ronay

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: After just 3 months of light usage, the battery has failed to hold charge which renders the headphones useless. Out of return window so no have an un-useable set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: faircommentphil

product_meta.title: Plantronics Back Beat Sense Stereo Headphone - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackUp to 18 battery hours. A high quality product, meeting your particular requirements at the office or at home.

BOX CONTAINS
Backbeat Sense Stereo Headphones
Audio Cable
Carrying Case
USB Charger
feature_bullets: Non-stop music for up to 18 hours

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
